test.query: SELECT number, avg(DISTINCT number) OVER () FROM numbers(0, 100_000) FORMAT Null;
SELECT number, avg(DISTINCT number) OVER (ORDER BY number) FROM numbers(0, 100_000) FORMAT Null;
SELECT number, avg(DISTINCT number) OVER (ORDER BY number ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 20 FOLLOWING) FROM numbers(0, 100_000) FORMAT Null;
